name: Rune Trackers - Old Version 2019
description:
RuneTrackers.

--this is not a complete game, it's just an unfinished prototype to test a mechanic, your feedback is essential at this stage--

this project is undergoing a complete rework to become a real game, this version you are about to try is the product of a game jam that took place in 2019, with that we got this game as a result, which took about a week to complete, now, in 2022, I returned to the project with the intention of transforming it into a complete and pleasant product to play,

Developer.

The game now has a single developer, who also works on the art, and that's me, Anokolisa, I'm working on the aesthetic reformulation of the game, trying to keep aspects of the gameplay similar.

The Future.

What does the future hold for this project? I have no idea, but what I do know is that I will work on this project until the end, or a little before maybe, my idea is to create a new reworked demo following the same paths as the 2019 original, and from that to add new environments and bosses of region, inspired by bullet hell games, I want to add spells and 4 starting classes, with a system of upgrades per level, so when we get to that stage, we'll know what to do next.

A taste of what's to come:

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
